img_above_text:
![Chapter One Secret Area \(9\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/9f/Chapter_One_Secret_Area_%289%29.png)
When the fight is over, you'll be taken back to the bell that was near the Whiteclad Noble in the Marsh of the White Mist.
img_below_text: You can now interact with the wolf that hangs from the nearby tree, to pick up the Fireproof Mantle.

img_summary: The image depicts a player character standing near a tree with a wolf hanging from it in a dark, atmospheric environment. The "Examine" prompt is visible, suggesting interaction with the wolf is possible. According to the surrounding text, examining the wolf allows the player to obtain the Fireproof Mantle after a battle near the bell in the Marsh of the White Mist.
